sent.orig: Productive technique and operation to process the garlic drink, garlic oil and garlic powder were introduced.
sent.trans: 本文介绍了大蒜饮料、大蒜油、大蒜蜜、大蒜粉的加工工艺及操作要点。

sent.orig: COLDS? EAT GARLIC! Clear up that stuffy head with garlic. remember, garlic lowers cholesterol, too.
sent.trans: 感冒？吃点大蒜吧！让大蒜来使头脑清醒！记住，大蒜还可以降低胆固醇。

sent.orig: In addition, sachet of garlic (garlic Guduo) is also a symbol of good fortune.
sent.trans: 此外蒜头香包（蒜骨朵）亦是避邪的象征。

sent.orig: In the raw garlic group the garlic was in a sandwich.
sent.trans: 服用生大蒜组的大蒜包埋在三明治内一同食用。

sent.orig: My company is Cang Shan county garlic, garlic moss base company.
sent.trans: 我公司是苍山大蒜、蒜苔基地公司。
